metadata.title: CVE-2024-28084 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: p2putil.c in iNet wireless daemon (IWD) through 2.15 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (daemon crash) or possibly have unspecified otherimpact because of initialization issues in situations where parsing ofadvertised service information fails.

criterions.comment: iwd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
